## RushConfiguration.rushPluginOptionsFolder property

The folder where rush-plugin options json files are stored. Example: `C:\MyRepo\common\config\rush-plugins`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get rushPluginOptionsFolder(): string;
```
